atlantis.engine.graphics3d

Class Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • atlantis.engine.graphics3d.Device

  • public class Device
extends java.lang.Object
    The graphics device. It's responsible to draw 3D object on screen.
    Author:
    Yannick
